news.title: Apple rolls out age-verification tools worldwide to comply with growing web of child safety laws

news.title: Uber engineers built an AI version of their boss
news.summary: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said the company’s employees have gone all in on AI, going so far as to build a chatbot of him that they use to practice their pitches.

news.title: Apple’s new age verification tools block underage app downloads where required by law

news.title: OpenAI defeats xAI’s trade secrets lawsuit

news.title: Let me see some ID: age verification is spreading across the internet
news.summary: Age verification is a reality on a growing number of social media platforms, requiring an ID or facial scan for full access to everything from YouTube to Roblox. news.title: Discord is delaying its global age verification rollout
news.summary: Discord won't roll out age verification globally on its platform next month as previously announced, and says in a blog post that it's delaying the launch until the second half of 2026.
